(2,): As a system administrator, I want to configure logging with rotation, so that I can troubleshoot issues without log files growing too large As a FABS user, I want to get submission details with validation errors, so that I can address any issues As a FABS analyst, I want to get updated FABS records, so that I can monitor recent changes
(0,): As a data manager, I want to process deletions of old submissions, so that our database doesn't retain outdated records As a database administrator, I want to update validation rules, so that data quality remains high As a data validator, I want to validate DUNS numbers, so that only properly formatted identifiers are accepted
(1,): As a submission reviewer, I want to update the publish status of submissions, so that their state is accurately reflected in the system As a system architect, I want to validate flex fields, so that they don't impact system performance As a testing coordinator, I want to update the UI testing schedule, so that stakeholders are aware of upcoming tests As a system administrator, I want to disable the publish button during processing, so that users don't submit duplicate requests As a financial analyst, I want to check GTAS window periods, so that I know when the site is in lockdown
(3,): As a data processor, I want to generate D files when FPDS data is updated, so that users have current information As a data analyst, I want to derive funding agency codes, so that records have complete information As a data consumer, I want to get FPDS data updated since a specific date, so that I can work with current information
